example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعتبر) (NP-SBJ-3 (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الفرصة)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM سانحة)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN توسيع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التعاون)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN البلدين)))))

arg.g: to expand cooperation between the two countries
